meanings.definition: The process of forming a patina on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The patinations on the old statue gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the patinations on the copper roof turned it green.
meanings.sent3: The patinations on the metal gate made it seem like it had stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: The patinations on the ancient coin hinted at its long history.
meanings.sent5: The patinations on the weather vane sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The green or brown film on the surface of bronze or similar metals, produced by oxidation over a long period.
meanings.sent1: The patinations on the bronze statue made it look aged.
meanings.sent2: The patinations on the church bell added character to its appearance.
meanings.sent3: The patinations on the metal doorknob made it hard to turn.
meanings.sent4: The patinations on the antique mirror frame reflected its long use.
meanings.sent5: The patinations on the garden sculpture blended beautifully with the surroundings.
